entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
